Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel”
Reviews.Author: Lavender007
Reviews.Content: stayed jardin de recoletos 5 nights april 12 central 5 mins walk retiro park approx 20mins walk main shopping restaurant clean kitchen fridge handythe window balcony easy cool street below narrow quiet staff friendly helpful hotel didnt soundproofed 6am onwards hear talking moving possibly partly due floors tiled opposed carpeted overall definitely recommend hotel
